DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the glycemic variations during acute coronary syndrome in non-diabetic patients (euglycemic, or with impaired fasting glucose, or with impaired glucose tolerance)
DOC.brief_title: evAluation of Glycemic RangE During acutE Coronary syndroME in Nondiabetic paTients (AGREEMENT)
DOC.detailed_description: All nondiabetic patients with dysglycemia (fasting plasma glucose between 100 and 125 mg/dl) will be monitored with a device (Continuous Glucose Monitoring System) and all these patients will be undergone an oral glucose tolerance test after the discharge from this Unit.
DOC.criteria: nondiabetic patients acute coronary syndrome diabetic patients
